website_summaries.verdict: The goalposts in this set consist of a powder-coated steel that will last over time.
pros: Steel targets are a good and durable value
Bolas consist of a rubber material that will last and is safer to use than hard golf balls
All parts fit inside a convenient carrying case
cons: Quality of materials used for the bolas is a little below average

customer_reviews.title: Weak link...plastic joints. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the all plastic versions last maybe two days, so I was stoked to see this was metal. However, when we assembled it was clear this will have very limited durability as well because the connectors for attaching upright to the legs are flimsy plastic. I am sure they will break very soon. See my pictures. Why would someone design such strong framing then connect it together at the most critical point with such a sub par method? I was willing to pay more and ended up with something just as fragile as the cheaper plastic models
customer_reviews.author: Greg in Boulder

customer_reviews.title: Bolas leak sand and base connectors are plastic, otherwise a great set.
customer_reviews.text: Set is pretty nice. Nice sturdy crossbars and posts. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Like another reviewer said, the piece that connects the upright posts to the base is made of plastic. So there's some concerns of longevity there. Also the bolas are nice and soft, however right out of the bag 2 of them were leaking sand. After a few uses, the bolas that are leaking are noticeably lighter. May need to invest in another bolas set. Other than those things, the set is great.
customer_reviews.author: burpeeMaven

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble, Sturdy And Fun.
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on ladder ball sets that broke after little use, I decided to try a metal one. Since there was only one other review for this product I was concerned that I was taking a chance, but I must say I am very happy with this product. It was very easy to assemble, and the metal ladders will clearly not break with normal use. The bolos are soft which are perfect for us since we have younger children. No need for someone to get accidentally hurt when trying to have fun. We plan on enjoying this set for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Colletto

customer_reviews.title: Ladder ball is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder ball set. It takes a few minutes to get set up but I love how it breaks down to store away in the carrying case. I've had this set up in my backyard and have also taken it to work events and tailgates, Most people haven't been familiar with the game but instantly love it once they play. I could see having to replace the bolos at some point but so far they are holding up well - even after being left out in the Vegas sun for most of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie U

customer_reviews.title: This set Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing set! I spent a ton of time researching different sets and reading more reviews then I care to think about... then I ran across this gem of purchase! Only two reviews but let me tell you, better then any other set I've seen! The fact that they are metal poles makes it feel sturdier then the others I've seen and it goes together in a minute! The bolos are rubber on the end and not a golf ball so it's even good for the younger players! This set rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Neonbendystraw

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily (with 2 people) and seemed sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in timely manner. Unboxed and assembled right away to insure all parts intact and fit. Went together easily (with 2 people) and seemed sturdy. Balls are very soft so we'll see how they hold up with play time. (I'm sure it will depend if you play on the grass or on concrete!) Agree with suggestion by reviewer to leave box inside carry bag to keep it sturdy and secure. Magnetic score keepers seem strong so hopefully they stay attached during play - not sure if they will be used anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Black

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk...
customer_reviews.text: Broke on first use. Tried to repair. Broke in a different location on second use, rendering is non-functional. Contacted the manufacturer to request replacement parts. Even though I described the problem in detail, they wanted photographs of the damage and copies of my invoice. Give me a break! I reputable company backs up their product no questions asked. I am returning this and buying one from a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry N.

customer_reviews.title: Fair but has room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is easy to assemble, portable, and comes with a carrying case. I dont like that the bolas leak sand right away, the string on the bolas arrived frayed, and the score stickers came unglued very easily. This item needs several improvements. I think if you want it to last you will need to burn the fraying of the strings, seal the bolas with a glue, and use a spray glue to hold the score sticker. Lastly, you can add some sand to the bottom bars since they can be sealed to make it sturdier. It is a fair to decent set but has room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Birrueta

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and quick on the set up and disassembly!
customer_reviews.text: Instantly set this up when it arrived the day of a backyard pool party and everyone had a blast. This set was very sturdy and easy/quick to set up! Also, given the metal design, it was exactly what I was looking for since I've played on numerous PVC sets that consistently fall over or come apart while playing. Would highly recommend this set if in the market for a fun backyard game.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Defective and not as stable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Our item was defective. We could not fit the blue colored bar into the hole provided. It was defective. Also, since this was metal, I would have expected it to be sturdier than it is. Very dissapointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Nut

customer_reviews.title: surefire family fun
customer_reviews.text: after reviewing many other ladder ball game sets from different brands, i ultimately went with this one based on the great reviews. we have been very happy with it! assembly was easy and only took a couple minutes. the construction seems sturdy and like it will hold up for a long time. we like the appearance and that there is a built-in magnetic scorekeeper on the side of one of the ladders. our only concern is that the scoreboard itself is a sticker and is already starting to peel, so we will likely need to reinforce with clear packing tape. despite that minor disappointment, this is still our new go-to yard game! highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: rch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set
customer_reviews.text: I researched ladder ball sets for awhile and most of them were made of plastic. This one was more costly than the rest but it's definitely worth it. The frame is made of metal & the balls are great quality too. My daughter has had hers for 3 years now and it gets used often & is still very solid. I've only had mine for a few weeks but it's already gotten some good use. I am so glad that I chose this brand. It comes with a nice storage bag for the end of the season or for traveling as well. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Balls already losing sand / weight but ladder is solid
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ladder set up compared to others though the balls started losing their sand and therefore weight after just 5-6 games. I am concerned if we play more that all the balls will have different weights and or no sand at all which there is no easy way to fix. Was not able to contact seller to see if we could get replacement balls or how to fix this problem. Would love some help on getting new balls or ..
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good size
customer_reviews.text: This ladder toss game is perfect for our yard. We set it up and very happy the framing is metal to keep it straight and sturdy. The balls and strings work well and we are enjoying the challenge. Also like the fact that its colorful.
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Quality does not match price
customer_reviews.text: We are on our annual vacation and ordered this Ladder Toss Game when we realized we left ours at home. We are disappointed in the quality in comparison to our first set. This set was twice the price as our original set but does not have the weight to keep the stands in place while playing. The stands move every time they are hit with the bolos. This could have been easlily remedied by weighting the base bars or by using heavier metal. We regret the purchase but since it is our family tradition to play this game and because we are in the wilderness, we will have to make do.
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is good quality. However, it should not be left out in the rain; internal surfaces are not coated and will bleed rust if allowed to accumulate rain water. An issue, so we moved it under cover when not in use. Update: 7 months after my purchase, the ropes were completely rotted and broke apart. The game had been stored outside, under cover, and in the shade. The game is now useless. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. D.

customer_reviews.title: True to its description!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love our Go Sports ladderball set! Set up is easy, and best of all the parts are solid and not flimsy. The knobs on the screws make for easy tightening and loosening, and all the pieces fit easily in the storage bag. My only suggestion is to make the bag in a color other than white. Its going to get dirty really quick. Kudos for the magnetic score keeper! Those magnets are so strong there is no way they will fall off! We are thoroughly enjoying this yard game!
customer_reviews.author: KarenO.

customer_reviews.title: Ladders very sturdy, easy to Assemble - Accessories less durable
customer_reviews.text: I tried several higher-end ladderball sets, and this is the best one so far since due to sturdiness of the ladders and ease-of-assembly and mobility. The carry-bag is a very helpful accessory, BUT the metal pieces will fray the fabric at the end of the bag after not too long. I recommend they reinforce the bag at the end where the rough end of the metal pieces make contact with the bag. Also couple of the bolo balls started leaking sand after one game, so I'm hoping the GoSports will replace them for me when they eventually lose too much sand to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder, suspect bolos
customer_reviews.text: This game is obnoxiously fun. My family and I have played a quite a few games since it arrived. The ladder itself is sturdy and easy to construct. The down side of the review is that the bolos were leaking sand a tad it when they came to us, and after some use, both sets now have one bolo completely out of sand. So for the ladder? It’s a good buy. The bolos were unfortunately a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I give it a nine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've used it in the backyard, at the beach, and in the snow and it has held up great. The colors are just as the picture shows. No imperfections. Set up can take a few but it's worth it to entertain at parties and on-the-go. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Sweet set
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. Lots of fun and easy to bring places.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Rusty out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a christmas gift for my nephews and they thought I gave them a "used" gift. They were full of rust right out of the box. After about 30 minutes of scrubbing and half a can of WD40 later, they looked better. But the rust is still there in some areas. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the metal construction, easy to follow instructions and overall quality of the ladders and balls. It was easy to assemble and seems very sturdy. The 4 rating, rather than 5, is only because the storage bag provided is a bit small and getting everything back into the bag is a bit of a challenge. Will update this review after use. Overall I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Softballcoach2011

customer_reviews.title: MISSING THE RED BOLOS.
customer_reviews.text: Just go around to putting ours together with the nice weather finally arriving. NO RED BALLS. Everything was in a box inside the package, but there was no red balls. I should probably put the whole thing together so that I can make sure I have the rest of the parts, but I'm pretty unhappy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from moisture.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set until bottom started to rust after a month and 3 plays. I think you just have to break it down after each play or store where no moisture gets in the bottom. Maybe drill a hole in the bottom for drainage. If you care for them, likely work well. Unfortunately, I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jethro Jonz

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This set has held up to many rounds of ladderball with no problems. Definitely worth a little extra for a metal set, the plastic ones break to easily
customer_reviews.author: Leah Howerton

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, we haven’t actually used it with full on family competition, but I put it together and tried it in the back yard, easy to put together and seems quite sturdy! I had bought a plastic one at the small box store and it lasted one weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ladder Toss Game on Amazon for the value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Ladder Toss Game a week ago and have used it twice now. It is very well made and we can tell it will last us for years. I did a lot of research and read many reviews. I also rarely write a review of my own. In this case I want to make sure others considering purchasing this product know they will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frame is sturdy, Balls leak sand
customer_reviews.text: The stand itself seems sturdy enough and has held up well from moderate use since June 2019. The star deduction comes from the bolo / ball leaking all its sand out. There doesn’t seem to be a good way to refill it without it leaking right back out. The balls don’t have nearly enough weight to them once they are empty.
customer_reviews.author: Poe

customer_reviews.title: Leaky/frayed balls
customer_reviews.text: The stands seem sturdy enough but the bolo balls are leaking sand the first time I used them. A couple of them had frayed rope right out of the box. If the bolos weren't so defective I wouldn't be considering a return. I don't see an option to exchange bolos only though.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Great ladderball set!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder ball set is well made, and stands up to all of the tossing. We have been playing it on the dirt road at our property, and have no problem with it tipping over (which was one of my concerns given review of various ladder balls). The medal posts and balls are all good quality and should hold up to years of use. We've had a lot of fun with this set!
customer_reviews.author: funshopping

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It's way sturdier than the plastic ones. It was easy to assemble. We've been using it for several weeks now, and it seems like it will last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger and better than all the plastic ones. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it has plastic sleeves for the vertical pieces to attach to the base frame. I see them breaking somewhere in the future. For now, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Assembled easily. Really like the score kerping on the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Marsh

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and best built of all models on the market
customer_reviews.text: this is a fun game for the whole family and its very durable if not abused
customer_reviews.author: bobdiver

customer_reviews.title: A Super Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when my granddaughters were coming to spend a week with us. The game is sturdy and super fun to play. The girls enjoyed it as much as Grandma and Grandpa did! Very well made and easy to store!
customer_reviews.author: cjp

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!!😡
customer_reviews.text: I am so not happy with these, really thought after reading the reviews they would be sturdy, they absolutely are not! Very flimsy and light weight latter portion, move constantly when a ball is wrapped around the rungs, also the balls are horrible and come apart every other throw....would not recommend and very disappointing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Cruson

customer_reviews.title: Bought several items from this company and I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the family for use in the backyard. It was very easy to put together. It was sturdy and didn’t fall over when in use. I was especially happy with the convenient carrying case. Will definitely buy from this company again. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Customer service  is above and beyond!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect! The complete package it’s fun to play. It’s easy to put together. The customer service is above and beyond what you would expect! It is one of the best made products we’ve bought in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CHristie

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The balls leak sand and now they have lost weight. The stand bases have cheap plastic clips that don't hold the feet in place and causing the stands to lean. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Henderson

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had an old cheap plastic set that was past its' life span. This was an amazing replacement! The structural quality of this game is great. Durable and will last years if taken care of like an adult that cares.
customer_reviews.author: Lola the Brown Dog

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: My brother bought one and I was impressed with how solidly it was built. We bought one for ourselves and another as a wedding gift! All of my friends love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sears

customer_reviews.title: A big hit
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to keep this review short. The product was a huge hit the first time I broke it out last year during Mother's Day week at the beach house. It has continued to be a favorite game at cookouts, tailgates, and other get-togethers.
customer_reviews.author: Rey S.

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different brand!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk all around. The bolos all fell apart, sand leaks out the first day followed by ropes disintegrate after a few months. Also the metal bars fade and start rusting within a few months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and way to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I put this together without any issues. Easy assembly and sturdy. I like the softer throw balls for indoor and outdoor use. We can’t wait to take it on our camping trip this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Bannock Morrow-Feniak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this set for almost a year now. It’s super easy to assemble and disassemble. It’s sturdy and made of metal, not plastic. It’s perfect for picnics, camping, or just in the backward. I accidentally found out the balls float! One of the kids threw one in the lake, and before we could yell no, it was floating. Nice surprise. I ended up losing my bag on a camping trip :( I emailed the company and they gladly sent me a replacement. Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: Brennie J.

customer_reviews.title: Held up great to constant use for the week
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with some other games for a beach vacation with family and friends. Kids put it together in just a few minutes. It was the only game that was played every single day on the beach. Held up great to constant use for the week. Compact for travel purposes. Would definitely give our family's stamp of approval.
customer_reviews.author: Russell E Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic holders for the vertical posts are impossible to keep in place. I ended up using epoxy glue to make this work. Just a little bit more quality and the product wiuld be .ich better than the plastic sets. Magnets for keeping score are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: milosmaj

customer_reviews.title: Ball problems
customer_reviews.text: The metal stand worked nicely and stayed standing the entire time. The balls are spilling sand and the rope is fraying after just 2 hours of use which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder golf game is super sturdy and just what we wanted for our “lawn games” at our wedding. It was really easy to put together and take down (less than 5 minutes). And the carrying case is great! We cannot wait to have our guests play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Looks on the cheaper side and showed up dirty
customer_reviews.text: Seems like this was a used game as there was dust and dirt all over the metal stand. Wish I could have received the new product I paid for. Needed it for an event and showed up the day of so didn't have the flexibility of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Will not fall apart.
customer_reviews.text: This is the set to buy. Don’t waste money on the PVC versions, they fall apart too easily. This was very easy to put together and it’s rugged. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter3591

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it and you won’t be disappointed. Requires a bit of assembly but it’s not rocket science. Definitely enjoy this game too.
customer_reviews.author: Mia B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and a nice bag to store it all in.
customer_reviews.author: Hello_Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: Great Game, the ladders are a little wobbly and could be better, but overall it performs as intended and is great family fun. The ladder rack is metal and the balls are a cheap hollow rubber. I've played with better sets, but this will do.
customer_reviews.author: REAL REVIEW...

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just put this together, very easy to assemble. The ladders and base are very sturdy. I haven't used it yet but I am impressed with the quality. Seems way more sturdy than the pvc pipe version.
customer_reviews.author: The Bez

customer_reviews.title: Decent set, but bolos are leaking sand
customer_reviews.text: Balls are filled with sand, so they are weighted nicely and throw great. However after the first use, sand has started to leak out. Towers are fairly stable once built, and I like the metal, colors, and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Jedidiah

customer_reviews.title: The sand from the balls goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The balls have sand in them that goes all over. I would say they lost half the sand or more in one game.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fun Product!
customer_reviews.text: Order arrived as described and it was easy to assemble just took a little longer then I thought. All material from the product is nice and works well. Enjoy playing in our backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Kids lined up to play this game
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a couple of the GoSports Premium Metal Ladder Toss Games for a special event. It was one of the favorite games that the elementary and middle-school age kids lined up to play. Fun & skill building at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: PNelson

customer_reviews.title: Poor wuality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game but the quality of materials is very poor. The bolos don’t hold their sand and they become uneven after just a few games. The ladders are also very weak and wobble badly. I only have this a 2 star because it was shipped quickly and arrived in time for the 4th of July as promised
customer_reviews.author: Chris Butler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fun game to play with the family. It is nice and sturdy, not cheap plastic. Balls are not the hard golf ball type though but still work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: WN

customer_reviews.title: Not all the pieces are metal
customer_reviews.text: The plastic connection pieces that connect the bottom base to the top structure break/fallout easy. Asked for new pieces and did not receive anything from them. Should come with replacement pieces because it becomes useless when they break.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Tangren

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Have already played this game with the family many times, it is very solid and sturdy will last forever
customer_reviews.author: Z. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and sturdy! Kids and adults all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rena Gibbens

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We like it for the stability, and we’re able to keep score with the markers on the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived with a broken bola, making game unplayable
customer_reviews.text: As described by another reviewer, this arrived with one of the bolas cracked and leaking sand. It's much lighter and unbalanced compared to the others. Game is unplayable.
customer_reviews.author: James Nichols

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this once so far but it was very sturdy and we were very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Connection to the legs is weak
customer_reviews.text: I thought the metal frame would make these more durable but I was wrong. The plastic insert in the legs is the weak link. It does not stay in place and after using this for a couple of weekends it is already loose and the ladder is wobbly. The PVC ladder that my friends have is much better. Buy the PVC version.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Besel

customer_reviews.title: packaging was great and it was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: packaging was great and it was very easy to assemble. i love that it has a case for easy transport. we enjoyed using it during my son's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product.
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 sets of blue balls. If I could find a way to contact someone and receive a set of red balls I’d be glad to change this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Alonzi

customer_reviews.title: Already rusted!
customer_reviews.text: Several poles are covered with surface rust. Rust particles all through out plastic bag containing poles. Doubt it will last long. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this is a very sturdy set unless of course you have a wild child like mine. Even without my son's wildness and abuse to this game it is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina V

customer_reviews.title: fun game
customer_reviews.text: only negative a can give is the rope frayed after one game
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: great camp game
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Put together and take apart easily. great quality parts.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haney

customer_reviews.title: Balls  are Crappy...DONT BUY THIS....Go for Real Golf Balls....not soft fake ones
customer_reviews.text: This ladder toss is fun...fairly sturdy.....but....the balls are plastic and filled with sand.....We have been playing about 5 days now and the Balls are losing sand and cracking at the seams....VERY DISAPPOINTED Would not buy this again....next time Real Golf Balls🤨🤨
customer_reviews.author: christy smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of fun playing with this game. I was unsure which one to buy and this one seemed costly versus some of the plastic ones but it was easy to put together, sturdy and is not too large to carry around. I didn't have any problem with the quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and is sturdy. Only used one summer, but seems like it will be durable. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Yard Gal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and fun to play 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Fun game; the magnets to keep track of scores is innovative👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: DrMS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a "kids corner" at my wedding,. It was awesome! Held up well and the kids loved it!
customer_reviews.author: jenn4UK

customer_reviews.title: My son and his girlfriend put this together - easily. They competed in the back yard for a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and his girlfriend put this together - easily. They competed in the back yard for a few hours. When some friends came over, they took it to the beach for, what I understand, some very heated competition!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Ladders Great. Bolo's Meh.
customer_reviews.text: We love the metal construction of the ladder but after only 6 games we have two bolo's that keep popping off of the cap attached to the string. We can't fix them so now we need to try and buy them separately.
customer_reviews.author: jchuck

customer_reviews.title: Rusty metal - don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I unpacked it for my daughter’s bridal shower to find the metal rusty. I don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Park

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: The connections from the posts to the ground pieces are very week. They wobble constantly. Just buy the cheaper PVC ones and replace every so often. NOT “PREMIUM”
customer_reviews.author: jim Ford

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love that this set is metal and more sturdy than the plastic model.
customer_reviews.author: Mkeastburn

customer_reviews.title: Fun At Family Gatherings.
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. Always play at family gatherings. Had a more plastic model but so much use the cross bars started to crack. This will definitely last because it is metal.
customer_reviews.author: ELevo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy, and still relatively light. Love having a carrying case for it. And I like that the balls are golf-ball hard. Less dangerous for energetic boys...
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Ok but no great
customer_reviews.text: Thought the quality wasn’t the greatest. Feels cheep and it’s a little awkward to put together without help
customer_reviews.author: Nortcheez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually very sturdy and very easy to put together and take down!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy and fun game
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy and fun game. Worth the price. I used it at my daughter's graduation party. Only problem, people liked it so much that it kept getting borrowed and I haven't gotten it back yet! Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Came with a travel bag. Sharp colors. Sturdy metal.
customer_reviews.author: LeahNick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item with heavy duty bolts and sturdy metal pieces
customer_reviews.text: This got lots of action at our picnic. Easy to put together and take down. I especially like that the carrying case is roomy enough so I was not trying to wedge things into it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed in MN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set it’s so easy to put together & take down, the carrying bag is awesome. It’s very durable, so much better than pvc pipe!
customer_reviews.author: shelby osborn

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Made well. Have ad it for a year now and it’s still going sting. We love to play this as a family
customer_reviews.author: Swen

customer_reviews.title: Needs better shipping packaging
customer_reviews.text: Solid set, would rate higher but all white metal parts discolored by cardboard packaging, makes them look rusty. Won’t wash off. Would’ve returned but family wanted to play on Xmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Psyclop

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. Metal frame seems sturdy. Much better than the pvc type. First weekend the balls started coming off the strings though....So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Gkgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Ladder Ball
customer_reviews.text: So we have owned several platinum ladder ball games and they have all broke within 2 to 3 months. This ladder ball rack was well constructed and has lasted over the summer with plenty of use..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my step daughter and her boyfriend. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fiumenero

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: High quality metal game. The only suggestion I have is that you may want to get some yard stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Solid and sure to hold up under ALOT of play time.Worth the price and highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Holmes

product_meta.title: GoSports Premium Metal Ladder Toss Game Set
product_meta.description: The GoSports metal ladder toss set is made from premium materials to provide the best overall ladder toss experience. The frame and rungs are made from powder coated steel for maximum durability. The bolos are made from soft rubber for indoor or outdoor use, and are connected using thick string to prevent tangles. Everything can be conveniently stowed in the included Zip-Up carrying case for maximum portability. Our goal is to provide you with the best possible game so you can get out there and have the most possible fun with friends and family.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC LADDER TOSS GAME: Complete set includes 2 steel targets, 6 bolos, and premium carrying case
SOLID STEEL SET: Made from durable powder coated steel to serve as a long lasting ladder toss set
SAFE BOLOS: Made from soft rubber so you can play indoors or outdoors and thick string to prevent tangles
EVENT DAY FAVORITE: Fun for players of all ages and a hit at parties, BBQs, tailgates, holiday weekends, campsites and more!
GOSPORTS WARRANTY: GoSports is a US Company with US customer support - 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed
